name: TooLoo.ai Skills OS
changelog: V2.1.0 - ENHANCEMENT PHASE: 5 critical gaps addressed
V2.1.0 - Vision Processing: /vision/analyze, /describe, /ocr endpoints
V2.1.0 - Vision supports Anthropic Claude, OpenAI GPT-4V, Google Gemini
V2.1.0 - Docker Sandbox: Isolated code execution with resource limits
V2.1.0 - Sandbox supports JS/TS/Python/Bash with 3 execution modes
V2.1.0 - Worker Thread Pool: CPU-intensive task parallelization
V2.1.0 - Built-in workers: JSON, text, arrays, regex, code analysis
V2.1.0 - RBAC Middleware: owner/admin/editor/viewer role hierarchy
V2.1.0 - Permission matrix: 9 permissions across 8 resource types
V2.1.0 - API Key Scopes: 15 fine-grained scopes for access control
V2.1.0 - Scope groups: all, read, write, execute, admin
V2.1.0 - Auto-scope middleware: automatic endpoint protection
V2.0.2 - LEGACY CLEANUP: Removed ~3MB of deprecated code
V2.0.2 - Deleted: src/cortex, src/precog, src/nexus, src/core, src/qa, src/cli
V2.0.2 - Silenced 401 auth errors when not logged in
V2.0.2 - Added orchestrator stub routes for legacy compatibility
V2.0.2 - src/ now 748KB (was ~4MB) - pure Skills OS
V2.0.1 - PROACTIVE OBSERVATORY: Real-time system intelligence dashboard
V2.0.1 - Observatory API: /observatory/pulse, /alerts, /insights, /engines, /healing
V2.0.1 - WebSocket pulse: Real-time engine metrics streaming every 5s
V2.0.1 - TooLooObservatoryV2: Engine meters, alerts panel, proactive insights
V2.0.1 - ObservatoryService: Anomaly detection, trend analysis, auto-insights
V2.0.1 - Self-healing integration: Live status, manual health check trigger
V2.0.0 - ALL PHASES COMPLETE: Skills OS V2 Production Ready
V2.0.0 - Phase 10 COMPLETE: Legacy Deprecation
V2.0.0 - UnifiedSkillRouter: Single entry point for ALL capabilities
V2.0.0 - Legacy code deprecated with migration guides (NOW REMOVED)
V2.0.0 - SKILLS_OS_ARCHITECTURE.md: Comprehensive documentation
V2.0.0 - Performance benchmarks: Native engines 10-50x faster
V2.0.0 - 30 skill YAMLs - 100% functional
V2.0.0 - 6 services - orchestration, scheduling, self-improvement
V2.0.0 - 4 native engines - learning, evolution, emergence, routing
V2.0.0 - 0% legacy engine usage - pure skill-based execution
V1.5.0 - Phase 9 COMPLETE: Autonomous Operation
V1.5.0 - SelfHealingService: Health monitoring, issue detection, auto-recovery
V1.5.0 - SkillSynthesizer: Gap detection, automatic skill creation
V1.5.0 - AutonomousLearningLoop: Continuous learning cycles, knowledge extraction
V1.5.0 - 30 skill YAMLs total (3 new: self-healing, skill-synthesis, autonomous-learning)
V1.5.0 - 6 services total in packages/skills/src/services/
V1.5.0 - Stress tests: 15/15 pass for orchestrator, scheduler, self-improvement
V1.4.0 - Phase 8 COMPLETE: Self-Improvement Activation
V1.4.0 - autonomous-evolution.yaml: Safe self-modification skill
V1.4.0 - SelfImprovementService: 5-stage pipeline (analyze/propose/test/review/deploy)
V1.4.0 - Risk-based approval: low/medium/high/critical with auto-approval
V1.4.0 - Automatic rollback on deployment failures
V1.4.0 - Phase 7 COMPLETE: SkillOrchestrator + SkillScheduler
V1.4.0 - Orchestrator: sequential/parallel/fallback/conditional/pipeline composition
V1.4.0 - Scheduler: cron/event/threshold/interval triggers
V1.4.0 - Phase 5-6: 27 skill YAMLs total
V1.3.0 - Phase 2 COMPLETE: Skills Wired to Native Engines
V1.3.0 - SkillEngineService: Bridge layer connecting skills to engines
V1.3.0 - learningSkill: Wired to LearningEngine (Q-learning, rewards, feedback)
V1.3.0 - skillEvolutionSkill: Wired to EvolutionEngine (A/B testing, strategies)
V1.3.0 - emergenceSkill: Wired to EmergenceEngine (patterns, synergies, goals)
V1.3.0 - API: /api/v2/engines/* endpoints for feedback, testing, emergence
V1.3.0 - New skill categories: learning, evolution, emergence
V1.2.2 - Phase 1 VERIFIED: All 4 Native Engines Boot Successfully
V1.2.2 - TypeScript strict mode compliance (fixed 'possibly undefined' errors)
V1.2.2 - Internal config types ensure required properties at runtime
V1.2.1 build 2 - Phase 1 COMPLETE: Native Engines (NO LEGACY DEPENDENCIES)
V1.2.1 - LearningEngine: Q-learning, epsilon-greedy exploration, rewards
V1.2.1 - EvolutionEngine: A/B testing, prompt strategies, improvement goals
V1.2.1 - EmergenceEngine: Pattern detection, skill synergies, emergent goals
V1.2.1 - RoutingEngine: Provider routing, waterfall fallback, health monitoring
V1.2.1 - Kernel integration: context.services.engines available to all skills
V1.2.0 build 1 - Phase 0 COMPLETE: ToolExecutor + 8 tools implemented
V1.2.0 - All 20 skill YAMLs now have full schema compliance
V1.2.0 - Safety checks: path validation, rate limiting, audit logging
V1.2.0 - Approval workflow for file writes and terminal commands
V1.2.0 - 13 tool execution tests, all passing
